mapper.select: SELECT RECORD_FLOW, STATION_FLOW, STATION_NAME, FROM_FLOW, FROM_NAME , RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW , ORG_NAME, ORG_FLOW, IS_REQUIRED FROM PDSCI.OSCA_SUBJECT_STATION_FROM WHERE RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND ORG_FLOW = 'sign' AND STATION_FLOW IN ( SELECT STATION_FLOW FROM PDSCI.OSCA_SUBJECT_STATION WHERE RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SUBJECT_FLOW = #{flow} )
